title.value: Risk-Aware Bid Optimization for Online Display Advertisement
title.justification: The title clearly reflects the primary focus and scope of the research paper.
title.quote: Risk-Aware Bid Optimization for Online Display Advertisement

extractions.description: This research focuses on bid optimization for online display advertisements in real-time bidding settings. It proposes a risk-aware, data-driven model to maximize expected profit while controlling the risk of violating budget constraints.

type.justification: The study employs real-world datasets to validate the proposed bid optimization models.
type.quote: the proposed bidding strategies are implemented and evaluated on a real-world dataset.

primary_research_field.justification: The research mentions the application of deep learning models like Deep Neural Networks (DNN) and DeepFM for predictions in the bid optimization process.
primary_research_field.quote: In recent years, with the development of Deep Learning (DL) research and recommendation systems, many researchers have applied Deep Neural Network (DNN) based models ... In the context of this work, we will employ a DeepFM model [Guo et al., 2017] to estimate θ(X).

sub_research_fields.justification: The focus of the paper is specifically on applying bid optimization models in the context of real-time bidding for online display advertisements.
sub_research_fields.quote: This research focuses on the bid optimization problem in the real-time bidding setting for online display advertisements.

name.justification: DeepFM is used in the study for modeling conditional click-through rate (CTR) and winning price distribution.
name.quote: In the context of this work, we will employ a DeepFM model [Guo et al., 2017] to estimate θ(X) ... the estimators of mean of winning price ŵ(X) and standard deviation of winning price σ(X) are DeepFM models.

caracteristics.justification: DeepFM combines deep neural network (DNN) components with factorization machines.
caracteristics.quote: In the context of this work, we will employ a DeepFM model [Guo et al., 2017] to estimate θ(X).

name.justification: DNN-based models are referenced as being widely accepted in the research and represent leading performance in real-world usage.
name.quote: In recent years, with the development of Deep Learning (DL) research and recommendation systems, many researchers have applied Deep Neural Network (DNN) based models.

caracteristics.justification: Deep Neural Networks are a class of deep learning models employed in the context of the research.
caracteristics.quote: many researchers have applied Deep Neural Network (DNN) based models.

name.justification: The Deep Censored Learning model is mentioned in the context of boosting CTR prediction quality and winning price distribution.
name.quote: The recent DL advancement also applies to the bid landscape problem. [Wu et al., 2018b] proposed the Deep Censored Learning model that uses a DL model for CTR prediction to boost the prediction quality on the winning price and considers its distribution into the learning.

caracteristics.justification: Deep Censored Learning employs deep learning techniques for modeling.
caracteristics.quote: The recent DL advancement also applies to the bid landscape problem. [Wu et al., 2018b] proposed the Deep Censored Learning model that uses a DL model for CTR prediction.

name.justification: The DLF model is referenced as combining deep learning for probability distribution forecasting and is based on a recurrent neural network (RNN).
name.quote: Deep Landscape Forecasting (DLF) model [Kan et al., 2019] combines DL for probability distribution forecasting and survival analysis for censorship handling based on a recurrent neural network (RNN) to model the conditional winning probability with respect to each bid price.

caracteristics.justification: The DLF model uses a recurrent neural network (RNN) for probability distribution forecasting.
caracteristics.quote: Deep Landscape Forecasting (DLF) model [Kan et al., 2019] ... based on a recurrent neural network (RNN) to model the conditional winning probability.

name.justification: The iPinyou dataset is used for experiments, model training, validation, and performance evaluation in the study.
name.quote: To test the effectiveness of our bidding policies, we design our experiments using the real-life iPinyou dataset ... The estimators θ(X), ŵ(X), σ(X) are trained and Lagrangian parameter λ optimized using the Training set (3,083,056 observations)...
